about_the_game:
Delta Perspective is a mission based stealth survival horror game with tactile weapon controls. Play as three characters with unique loadouts and playstyles and descend into the D-3 mineshaft, discover the secrets of what went down, and then try and escape with their lives.

TACTILE WEAPONS

Ammo is limited and your guns are hard to use. Utilize each character's main weapon: the Poacher's hunting rifle, the Negotiators' shotgun, and the Union Buster's assault rifle. All of these weapons have unique control schemes, letting you manually operate the gun. You'll need to learn and optimize the function of each weapon to survive the dangers lurking inside the decrepit caves.

EYESHIFTING

See through your enemies' eyes. They see better than you and they're faster than you. The only way you're seeing daylight again is if you use their sight against them. Find hidden items and the safe way forward seeing things from a new perspective. Each character has a unique way of Eyeshifting that supports their own unique playstyle.

MULTIPLE CHARACTERS

Play as multiple characters with entirely different styles of play. From the careful stealth of the Poacher, the tense defending of the Negotiator, and the limiting fixed camera angles of the Union Buster, you'll constantly be seeing the environment and your enemies in different ways.

FEATURES

-Constant push-forward gameplay

-Detailed and open levels with tons of secrets to find

-Tense resource management

-Grotesque and twisted enemies

-Score system to encourage replays

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04+
  • Processor: AMD™ Ryzen 3 1200/Intel™ i5-7400
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce™ GTX 660ti/Radeon™ Vega 8
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
  • Additional Notes: Delta Perspective has a limited development budget, so these specs may not be the absolute minimum.
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04+
  • Processor: AMD™ Ryzen 5 1600/Intel™ i5-8400
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce™ GTX 1050ti/Radeon™ RX 470
  • Storage: 3 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: The Linux version of Delta Perspective reportedly uses larger amounts of memory compared to the Windows version due to the Vulkan™ API.

short_description: Following a strike going dark at the D-3 mining facility, three people become intertwined as they attempt to uncover what remains in the depths of the mines. Utilize 'Eyeshifting' to view enemy POVs and plan a safe path through this survival horror game with tactile gun handling mechanics.
